column4: when i boot into ubuntu.. i get the error : rename_netif wlan0 to eth1 and it hangs there for a min.. i've tried all the solution offered in the ubuntuforums  any other ideas pls? (this is on broadcom 1390) using ndiswrapper
Is your card supported by bcm43xx ?
Then try bcm43xx-fwcutter instead of NDISwrapper
uninstall NDISwrapper and sudo apt-get install bcm43xx-fwcutter
